art.quote: Everything that is beautiful and noble is the product of reason and calculation.
art.author: Charles Baudelaire

love.quote: In dreams and in love there are no impossibilities.
love.author: Janos Arnay

management.quote: Leadership has a harder job to do than just choose sides.  It must bring sides together.
management.author: Jesse Jackson

inspiring.quote: Don’t count the days; make the days count.
inspiring.author: Mohamad Ali

funny.quote: Washington is a place where politicians don't know which way is up and taxes don't know which way is down.
funny.author: Robert Orben

sports.quote: The triple is the most exciting play in baseball. Home runs win a lot of games, but I never understood why fans are so obsessed with them.
sports.author: Hank Aaron

life.quote: To avoid criticism do nothing, say nothing, be nothing.
life.author: Elbert Hubbard
